name: Hassan Aly Aboulela
summary: I have around 6 years experiences in the field of Accounting & banking works, with Egyptians and foreign companies, I'm really honored to introduce myself as a hardworking, good Communication skills, with the highest level of integrity, honesty, loyalty, strong beliefs, goal orientated, sober habits and the desire to produce the best of the work.

experience.title: General Accountant
experience.description: Completed opening customer accounts using National Bank of Egypt system; evaluated requests for new accounts to ensure compliance with Egyptian standards; processed around 50 branches per day and nearly 500 accounts per day.

experience.title: Customer Service
experience.description: Delt with customers via telephone, email, or face-to-face; responded promptly to inquiries; resolved complaints; provided pricing and delivery information; set up new customer accounts.

experience.title: General Accountant
experience.description: Prepared financial and accounting reports for presentation to the Financial Manager; produced weekly and monthly revenue and expense reports; prepared journal entries; managed general ledger operations; performed account/bank reconciliations; assisted with audit preparation and coordination.

experience.title: General Accountant
experience.description: Prepared financial and accounting reports or presentations to the Financial Manager; prepared weekly and monthly revenue and expense reports; journal entries; complete general ledger operations; account/bank reconciliations.
